mapper.select: SELECT pno, tno, pseller, pbuyer, pstate FROM payment WHERE pno=#{pno} AND pstate=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (pno, mwriter, rcontent, rpoint, mtarget) VALUES(#{pno}, #{muuid}, #{rcontent}, #{rpoint},#{targetMember})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mpoint=mpoint+#{rpoint} WHERE muuid=#{targetMember}
UPDATE member SET mnickname=#{newNickname} WHERE muuid=#{uuid}
mapper.select: SELECT r.mwriter, r.rcontent, t.ttitle, m.mnickname FROM review r JOIN payment p ON r.pno = p.pno JOIN trade t ON p.tno = t.tno JOIN member m ON r.mwriter = m.muuid WHERE rno=#{rno}
